name: Pylot.fun
description: Pylot is an all 1 in co-pilot specifically designed for the Solana ecosystem. It allows users to interact with major solana protocols such as Dexscreener, Pumpfun, Believe, Bonk, Kamino and many more directly from the dashboard instead of having to navigate through multiple tabs and apps. Pylot plans to become the main all in 1 hub for Solana ecosystem where users can trade, launch tokens. They will be able to manage all their yield positions, participate in prediction markets, trade NFTs all from 1 place.
